浘字的基本解释

浘
wěi
〔浘浘〕（水）盛大，如“河水浘浘”。
〔浘??（
l?）〕古同“尾闾”，古代传说是海水泄漏的地方，即海水从这里流出去。

浘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》無匪切，上尾，明。］
(1)见“浘”。
(2)见“浘浘”。

浘字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　浘； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页623第20
【廣韻】無匪切【集韻】武匪切，?音尾。浘?，海洩。【莊子·秋水篇】作尾閭。　又水流貌。與浼同。【詩·邶風】河水浼浼。【韓詩】作河水浘浘。　又【類篇】一曰泉底。

浘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
浘字的起名意思

暂无。

浘
Basic explanation of words
浘
wěi
〔浘浘〕(水) Grand, such as "Rivershui 浘浘".
〔浘?? (
l?)] In ancient times, it was the same as the "tail lute". The ancient legend was that the seawater leaked out, that is, the seawater flowed out from here.
浘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" no bandit cut, upper tail, Ming. ]
(1) See "浘".
(2) See "浘浘".
浘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　浘; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 623 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Cut without bandits [Ji Yun] Cut with bandits without bandits, sound ending. Huh?, sea vent. 【Zhuangzi·Autumn Water】As the tail of Lu.　The water flow appearance. Same as Chan. 【Poetry·Bei Feng】The rivers are rushing. [Han Poetry] As a river water 浘浘.　[Classes] One is the bottom of the spring.
